response.original_title: Я услышу салют за тысячи километров
response.overview: How do you find the right way out of a difficult situation when you are a lonely teenager? Ksyusha lives in her own reserved world, and the only person with whom she has developed a trusting relationship, is now in prison. In 2017, Ksyusha's boyfriend walked into a school with a weapon and was sentenced to 7 years and 3 months. Soon he will be released from prison, so the heroine will have to think this relationship over and understand if she really wants to be with this guy.
response.title: I Will Hear the Fireworks from Thousands Miles Away
